product_name: The North Face Glacier Micro Quarter-Zip Top - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With sporty color blocking, The North Face Glacier Micro Quarter-Zip top for boys adds an athletic touch to a microfleece top that he can wear indoors and out. Lightweight polyester microfleece is durable and pill-resistant. Quarter-zip at neck provides ventilation and a pop of contrasting color. Pull the zipper all the way up the tall collar on The North Face Glacier Micro Quarter-Zip top for extra warmth when he needs it. Closeout.
short_description: With sporty color blocking, The North Face Glacier Micro Quarter-Zip top for boys adds an athletic touch to a microfleece top that he can wear indoors and out.
